channel.title: Posts on Terminal
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Terminal

item.description: From the very beginning of my life, I was a quite nerd always sceptical about the things against the rules. But always a top ranker even without putting the efforts that I would have put like others do. Can say a god gifted one, with the skills of understanding anything with ease if that thing creates a sense of curiosity in me !.
item.content:
From the very beginning of my life, I was a quite nerd always sceptical about the things against the rules. But always a top ranker even without putting the efforts that I would have put like others do. Can say a god gifted one, with the skills of understanding anything with ease if that thing creates a sense of curiosity in me

!.
